ContactMessage.title: Contact Message
ContactMessage.description: Represents a single message submitted by a user via the form.

message.description: The message content submitted by the user.

lastMessageAt.description: Timestamp of when the message was submitted.

from.description: Indicates the origin of the message (always 'user' in this collection).

/contacts/{messageId}.description: Stores each message sent from the initial form as a separate document.
